short_summary: NRCan is seeking proposals to conduct a survey to gather data on the bioeconomy in Canada
description: Natural Resources Canada is looking for a capacity survey project to gather detailed capacity, production, market, and socioeconomic data of the bioeconomy in Canada including but not limited to wood based bioenergy and bioheat, bioproducts, biomaterials, biochemicals, biofuels, and advanced low carbon building materials. The resulting contract will be from date of award to April 30, 2024.
full_summary:
***
# Tenders: Forestry Bioenergy and Bioeconomy Survey in Canada
***
## Published on: June 14, 2023
The Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) department invites proposals from qualified vendors to conduct a comprehensive survey of Canada's forest bioenergy and bioeconomy sector. The aim of this project is to gather detailed information on capacity, production, market, and socio-economic data.

### Solicitation Information

*   Solicitation Number: NRCan - 5000071455 (D)
*   Tender Closing Date: July 14, 2023 at 14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: August 9, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: April 30, 2024

### Notice and Attachments

To retrieve the full notice and supporting documents, visit the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice). Download the attachments listed below:

[RP-Ann-d-3](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6419/rfp-amendment-3-for-%28d.pdf)
[RP-Ann-d-1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6419/rfp-amendment-1-for-%28d.doc-fr-eng.pdf)
[RP-Ann-d-2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6419/rfp-amendment-2-for-%28d.doc-fr-eng.pdf)
[Demande-de-proposition](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6419/nrcan---5000071455%28d-french_0.pdf)
[RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6419/rfp-nrcan-5000071455-%28d.pdf)

### Contact Information
Julia Pace is the primary contact person. Please contact her at (902) 719-4856 or at [julia.pace@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:julia.pace@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca).

### Proposal Selection Criteria
*   Evaluation will be based on the selection criteria of highest combined rating for technical merit and price.

### Notice Type
This tender announcement is a request for proposals with a competitive
